You will not be disappointed.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate

I love this product. It is so hard to find a decent charging chord that is able to withstand my rugged lifestyle and stay in one piece after a week. I am glad to say that this is one of the best charging chord that I have had for my Samsung galaxy S3 in years. Most fray or tear at the portion that plugs into the phone, but not this one. It has been through international travel and car chargers. This is definitely a fast and reliable charger.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate.

This is a great vent car mount that is perfect for my phone. I have used this with my Samsung Galaxy S3 and my Husbands Iphone 6. It keeps it nice and snug and mounted well so that we are able to use it for various different reasons. I personally use the mount for the google maps for when my GPS is inefficient as well as for my Pandora App so that I can switch the songs as needed on my favorite station.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate

What can I say about this? Well I was looking for something to help me out in the bathroom to clean and organize my children's bath toys. I am sick and tired of seeing toys everywhere or worse yet, stepping on their toys when I walk into their bathroom. Well with this mesh bag, it is east to place, there are four hooks to hold the bag in place.  My favorite part is the mesh on the bottom as well as the front. . I do not have to worry about water being trapped in the container because it is made of mesh and will drain right into the tub. Mildew be gone.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate.

These are absolutely beautiful. It almost confuses you because they look so real. I love wearing these when I am out in the field. It is very similar to my wedding set and people actually complement me more when I am wearing these instead of my real set. My favorite part? I have been wearing them for about a week and I have showered with them, swam with them and they have not turned my finger green or dimmed in any way. They are absolutely stunning as well. They sparkle and shine as they hit the sun.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate

This is a great Humidifer.  I love it because we live in Colorado and the higher elevation dries out everyone. We used this in our bedroom so that no one gets dried out and they no longer wake up with bloody noses.  It is designed for a smaller room, so I use it in my daughters room at night to help her with her breathing. She was getting more dried out than the rest of us and her room is the smallest in the house so this one is best suited for her.I am so grateful I was chosen to review this product for my honest and unbiased opinion at a reduced rate

I have a bottle of 240 (bonus 40 capsules) of the Viva Labs 100% Chelated Magnesium and have been taking 2 tablets daily with my calcium. This particular product is supposedly more easily absorbed than other forms but I see no difference.  It is interesting that the label says to take 2 tablets twice daily and the serving size is listed as 2 tablets,  so I'm sticking with the one dosage of 2 daily routine for this bottle.

I've been taking these collagen caplets and am not really sure if they are doing a thing.  Nevertheless,  I'm not doing any worse,  so I'll finish the bottle.  With so many supplements available now,  it is easy to consume more than needed,  and I suspect that this is one that I will not reorder.  If you are in the market for Hydrolyzed Collagen,  this Vitamin World item may be just what you need.

Solid Gold Lil' Boss dog food has been well received and tolerated.  It's being enjoyed by a Westie who tends to be a picky eater.  I like the bag because it arrives well sealed but always store the kibble in an airtight container after it is opened to maintain freshness.

I don't understand why so many products like this have a strong unpleasant scent when removed from the package,  but this mat stunk until I soaked it it vinegar and warm water. I did this while it was in the tub. My preference was the clear vinyl because I like the simple look which matches everything.  While showering,  I felt more secure than when standing in a bare bathtub. The suction holds well yet in a moment, it is possible to unstick the mat for routine cleaning and airing out.  There is a slight cushiony feel to this mat.

Brita has definitely worked on and succeeded in constructing a streamlined water pitcher that filters and then provides a suitable home for six cups of water with each fill.  My previous observation of Brita filtration pitchers was that the filter was located in exactly the area where it ought not be and this has been rectified with its position in today's pitcher.  Included is one of the new filters which even improves the nothingness taste of filtered water. The plastic components seem harder and more rigid and the pieces all fit together securely.  I'm not in love with the red color but I do love the new structural design. The timer display is reset by pushing a button for 5 seconds and then each time the lid is lifted up for at least 10 seconds,  a fill is recorded.  The battery is said to last a few years and then we return to our own timing.  I am not impressed with this timing display but I certainly am impressed with the pitcher. Do not put any of the parts in the dishwasher.

When I lived in San Francisco,  I made regular visits to The Exploratorium, where I believe I first was introduced to the name, Ivan Moscovich. I am not a mathematician, but I do appreciate the beauty it portrays and am on awe of those who have what I never will, an image handle on it.  This heavy hardbound book,  The Puzzle Universe is entertaining,  but more importantly for me,  stimulating and challenging.  Most puzzle books are not as well written,  not as nicely illustrated,  and lack the historical and biographical background provided in this. It is the kind of book that could change a life's course when read by someone who can work both sides of their brain yet is not yet sold on the value or beauty of mathematics.

Not a huge fan of simulated jewels,  I'm having a change of heart with what I've seen of the Amazon Curated Collection offerings.  I recently received a pair of simulated ruby earrings that share a similar design as this lovely and elegant simulated sapphire pendant.  I am happy to wear them together. The setting of this necklace is done perfectly with each prong burnished to a smooth edge and the stones all securely set.  It is a bargain when you consider the cost of costume jewelry that may be made of a base metal and not sterling silver. It is gorgeous and feels good around the neck.

For cuteness,  these socks are 5 stars,  but for practicality and quality control,  they lose.  The package of six are not uniformly sized and one of them had the anti-skid stuff added to the top of the sock,  not the sole area. These remind me of some socks I purchased at a dollar store years ago,  they were cute but did not last.  All of these socks did wash and dry with no problem. They are not sized for newborns. I received a sample for my honest evaluation.

It is so much easier to lift this 6 cup Brita Atlantis water filter pitcher than my previous large size Brita and it fits in the refrigerator.  The blue color is very pretty and the filter fits perfectly as long as you have it lined up properly.  The lid snaps onto the pitcher very well and the spout flap moves when water is poured. One thing I don't quite understand, though,  why is the filter positioned in the area directly where tap water is added,  just where the pitcher fits under the faucet? This is precisely where water is not to be added,  directly on top of the filter.  Anyway,  the water tastes great,  so I will continue being careful when filling the pitcher.

The plating on this small pendant is done well,  as is the casting which is finished nicely, with the exception of one rough spot. If you are considering this piece,  be sure to check out the photo which demonstrates its petite size and do not expect to receive a disk the size of a quarter. I like the method used to attach the disk to the chain and while I usually prefer a more substantial chain,  this one works visually because of the little pendant with an open design.  Unfortunately,  the chain on mine broke about an inch from where it was attached to the pendant on day one.  I'm going to replace the chain.

We have received several types of solid gold dog food varieties and have found them all to be good kibble.  This one has been enjoyed by a 50 pound dog who typically rays the Costco based of fish based food and although she prefers the others,  did consume the small bag when mixed with her usual food. She showed no sensitivity to this food and is herself,  fit and fabulous.

The iluminage Precise Touch hair remover is smaller than the iluminage touch that was previously introduced, but I am uncertain as to the differences since I have not seen the first model.  This one is small enough that it can be taken along for travel if necessary, say if you will be away from home for more than a week. I say this because it is suggested to use the hair removal tool once a week for seven weeks to achieve the best results for permanent hair loss.  Since it is not battery operated, all you need is an electric outlet and about twenty minutes if you want to use this on both legs.  Of course smaller body areas would take less time, but that gives an example of the time involved.  This is used after shaving and I have used it immediately after shaving to get at the root of the matter, that is the hair.  There was no real sensation and no smell of burning hair.  Wearing the provided small goggles adds a level of security, particularly if one is sensitive to strobe lights because this functions by small bursts of bright light which should not be looked at.  There are a lot of warnings for this product, like not using it over areas with tattoos, something that could be an issue.  I would recommend visiting the manufacturers website to view their video about using the product and hope that you do not find the seven times weekly to be as offputting as I did.  My first interpretation was to use it seven times for a week, but knew instinctively that would be too often.  I have not used this on the high setting but likely will progress to that temperature in time.  This is an interesting grooming tool that could benefit many and at the cost of around three hundred dollars right now, it could actually save money for those who have hair removed professionally.

Particularly suitable for a little princess, the Bamoer CZ round pendant is very cute and sparkly.  It is far from high fashion jewelry, but for the price, it is nicely done and can make a person feel lovely.  Because this is costume jewelry, I would be very careful and not sleep in it or wear it swimming or in the shower.  Nevertheless, it has a nice sparkle which has not diminished in the weeks I've had it.  I was provided a sample for my honest evaluation.

For professional use or even home storage of one's own rings, the Novel Box stackable trays are well made, pack well, and hold up to being handled.  The wood trays are well made and have provided me an affordable option to display my wares in a compact and secure system, with well done inserts for each type of jewelry.  Novel Box provided a sample for my honest evaluation and once again, it is a product that has made a great impression.

As I've come to expect, Novel Box once again provides a very well made utility tray, complete with the inserts for storing gems, jewels or findings.  With perfectly cut out sections, the plastic parts can be lifted out with ease and reinserted when you are done.  These are also outstanding for taking with to shows for displaying items and the impression it makes in favorable.  Being able to stack them makes for a compact system.  I was provided a sample for my honest evaluation.

If you are in the market for a beautiful gender neutral presentation box for a special ring, look no further.  Novel Box provided a sample for my honest evaluation and I am very pleased with the quality and impression the box makes.  Finish is well done, very smooth, and nice looking, perfect for not only presenting the ring, but for storage as well.  I think this is an excellent choice for gifting a family heirloom because it will last much longer than other cardboard boxes.

The Palmarosa essential oil by Simply Earth is priced very well and has been a pleasure to add to my diffuser in combination with other oils.  Not one of my favorite scents, a small bottle which was securely packaged is just enough.  I have noticed that the oil aids in creating a very serene atmosphere and I will use a few drops in my next batch of body balm.  I received a sample for my honest evaluation.

The knee support sleeve works very well for stabilizing the knee, particularly during exercise.  It is also very attractive and I have experienced no problems even after washing it in the sink and air drying the sleeve.  The length of it is a little longer than I'm used to, but it is comfortable when worn for a couple hours.  Fitoby provided a sample for my honest evaluation.

Both components of this metal Perky-Pet Cardinal duo are attractive and when hung, provide a source of entertainment for us humans and a buffet for the birds.  If you are wanting to hang this right away, be sure you have a supply of sunflower seeds ready, and get a hook or post on which to hang these.  On a nice day, this is a pleasure to watch but beautiful weather is not a requirement for enjoying the birds discovering the relatively small pair.  I like that these are lightweight and the only negative is the shells that remain behind.

The baby is still too young to use this New Tubby Table Bathtime Toy, so I tried it myself and love it.  I had no problem sticking it to the tub floor and can see envision how much fun this will be when he is able to sit up by himself and play with the cups, filling them with water, pouring them, and using the table for the toys he is able to enjoy even today.  If my sister and I would have had this tub when we were little, I think we would have been even more wrinkled at the end of our baths than we were.  I also like its compact form, so when not being used, it can be dried and stored with ease.

The Luseta Beauty Argan Oil Hair Masque is very suitable for dry or damaged hair and when used in conjunction with shampoo and conditioner also containing Argan oil, can be effective in producing a nice sheen in otherwise lifeless hair.  The smell is not offensive, but it does have a scent.  I received a sample for my honest evaluation.

The Clear-Ad brochure holder is very similar to another I have been using, but this one has edges that are a bit sharper.  The plastic is very clear and there is no problem with it remaining upright regardless of the number of brochures or business cards it holds.  I received a sample holder for my honest evaluation.

The Ivation Evaporative Cooling Towel is rather interesting.  It is a pretty shade of blue and arrived inside a nice hard plastic container.  Out of the container, is was soft and had a sort of dampness to it but it was not really wet.  I hung it overnight and was very surprised to find a stiff towel int he morning, so I immediately ran it under the faucet, wrang it out, rolled it and placed it back in the hard plastic case.  I placed it in the refrigerator so that it would be cool when I needed it later in the day, so it started off as a very cold towel when applied to my head and neck after a workout.  The next time I used it, I did not use the refrigerator for cooling it, yet found that it was as soothing when used.  I wash it in the sink after each use but do not lot it dry completely before returning it to the case.  I have been using this at home, but if I were to take it elsewhere, I would carry it in a sealed plastic bag.  I received a sample for my honest evaluation.

I do not read a lot of science fiction but was intrigued by the premise of Saturn Run.  The fictional book is interwoven with more scientific information than other mysteries or thrillers, yet the highly readable dialogue and creative characters made for a couple days of entertainment without bogging down the mind in trying to comprehend the whats and whys.  It is a quick read.

The look of the Gaiam Mary-Jane Grippy Yoga Socks is very attractive and actually comforting to look at.  The grippy dots are very functional and the cut outs for the toes are smart for movement without slippage.  Unfortunately, these are very large for a one size fits most offering and my feet are the textbook average size.  They are made of 87% cotton, but since I wash them in cold water and air dry them, they have not shrunk at all.  Regardless, I am loving them for the design, construction, appearance and comfort.

Very rarely, I receive a pieced of jewelry that is much better in person than the images provided online.  This Celtic pendant is one of such products.  Ignore the imperfections that appear in the Amazon photo, as this is truly without a flaw.  There is no break in the thread which wraps into the square woven pattern.  The pendant is edged nicely and the weight is more substantial than the photo implies.  This was made in China and was not only formed beautifully, but was finished well, too.  The chain is very light, so I am wearing it with another that is better suited in my opinion.  I have placed another small pendant on the thin chain provided with this pendant, so the entire piece will be well used.

The Ferplast Tape Retractable Dog Lead is not a Mini size, but rather the Medium size which is for a maximum weight dog of 25 kg or just over 55 pounds.  I was not expecting to love this one as much as the others I have been using religiously for years, but I was wrong.  I thought it would be a lead that was more for show than for utilitarian and safe functionality, but I was wrong.  I thought it looked good in the provided images and I was right.  In other words, this is a good lead that I am happy to use for walking my dear dog.  The tape lead is a good quality, the gears move very smoothly with little effort, the handle is large enough to be held while I wear gloves, and the lock is secure.  With a large single button that has both a temporary and locking set, it is just as easy to unlock the locked mechanism as to lock it.  The hardware is solid and also moves with ease.  If you want to purchase a decorative plastic cover to make an impression, there are several available.  I am not into dressing my dog other than a sweater or coat to prevent her from the cold and I don't accessorize her other than the jeweled crown brooch I've pinned onto her Puppia harness, but if I ever decide to purchase one of the covers, I already have it picked out.

Most milk chocolate bars made in Europe contain sweetened condensed milk. This tends to produce a sweeter chocolate product,  almost like a white chocolate.  The Cailler milk chocolate is a traditional confection that is creamy and very much liked by children because of the rather benign flavor which is more milky. The bar is good,  particularly for those who prefer a milder chocolate.  It is more expensive than other Nestles products,  so I personally won't be buying these for kids,  but for adults who love the European style of milk chocolate,  this was well received. It seems that there is currently  a greater interest in the USA for milk chocolates and this is worth a taste.

I take glucosamine daily and am not married to one particular brand.  The Zenwise tablets can be swallowed as easily as others and produced no I'll effects. Is a good combination and I will continue to include this in my rotation. I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased feedback.

For a few weeks,  I've been experiencing more stress that usual.  I've been taking the Ashwagandha capsules and actually have been feeling better.  Using deep breathing exercises and mindfulness in addition to the capsules,  I've been able to remain healthy even when others around me have been getting sick.  I'll continue talking this product. I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased feedback.
